article: eu officials have repeatedly said that greek cyprus will join the european union -lrb- eu -rrb- , even if there is a collapse of the island 's faltering reunification talks , which un chief kofi annan looks to salvage with a visit here this week .
abstract: greek-cypriots will enter eu even if reunification talks fail
